description: This file defines a dataclass 'Config' for application configuration, loaded from environment variables, specifically for database connection settings like MongoDB URI, database name, and collection name. It includes a static method 'from_env' to create a Config instance with environment variable validation and default values.

classes.name: Config
classes.description: Immutable configuration dataclass holding MongoDB connection details, loaded via environment variables.

methods.name: "Config" from_env()
methods.description: Creates a Config instance from environment variables with validation and default values.
